package.name: csm
package.description: The master branch of the Canonical Scan Matcher (CSM) library, downloaded from http://github.com/AndreaCensi/csm. The header files have been separated into an 'includes' directory to mimic the standard ROS structure, and all include paths have been updated accordingly. A ROS 'CMakeLists.txt' file has been generated that compiles the CSM library, but none of the utilities are built.
package.author: Andrea Censi
